pageContext.claim: “The Fake News put out a typically false statement, without any knowledge that the United States was trying to set up a negotiation with Iran. This is a false report.... ...Iran will call us if and when they are ever ready. In the meantime, their economy continues to collapse - very sad for the Iranian people!”
pageContext.analysis: A ridiculous falsehood, considering what Trump said four days prior to this tweet: "What I’d like to see with Iran, I’d like to see them call me." The day after he said that, a senior administration official told reporters that the U.S. was trying to start talks with Iran.
